rules_text:
Trample
Whenever Wolf-Whistle Satyr deals combat damage to a player or planeswalker, you may sacrifice it. If you do, bless target creature you control. [i](Create a token copy of this creature’s blessing attached to that permanent.)[/i]
rules_text2:
[i](You may also cast this side from your hand.)[/i]
Enchant creature
When Fable of Tooth and Fur enters, create three 2/2 green Wolf creature tokens.
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 for each creature you control and gains trample.
